work.summary: iTMethods builds, deploys, and manages dev-ops toolchains for large development teams
highlights: Developed a web portal and monitoring/reporting tools for managing hundreds of AWS accounts and other applications. This reporting includes detecting security vulnerabilities, tracking user counts over time, etc.
Built a REST API (using the Serverless architecture) which accompanies aforementioned portal and tools
Created a process to automate DNS registry for instances on AWS, facilitating the management of these instances

work.summary: Worked in the Center for Cognitive Computing, primarily on tasks surrounding a natural language processing pipeline
highlights: Co-developed Python (Flask) microservice which converts text queries into vectors, and searches a large vector space for related text
Added continuous integration/deployment to a large suite of microservices, and “Dockerized” said microservices
Aggregated data from a SQL Server for use in an internal hackathon; participated in this hackathon

work.summary: Worked in the Global Equity Derivatives group
highlights: Trade strategy programming: applied machine learning algorithms to predict security lending rates and to determine the impact of market variables on these rates
Built and debugged Excel macros to manage simple tasks
Co-developed email management application to filter and perform actions on emails based on set criteria

awards.title: Dean's Honour List
awards.summary: Awarded to students within the top 10% of all students in the faculty of Science

awards.title: Emily Ross Crawford Scholarship
awards.summary: Awarded to candidates of high academic merit in the work of the U1 or U2 year
